title: Herbal Nerve Tonic (Jatamansi + Ashwagandha)
excerpt: A calming blend with jatamansi, ashwagandha, and brahmi to support nervous system resilience and sleep quality.
content:
## What Is This Nerve Tonic?
A supportive Ayurvedic blend crafted for nervous system balance, emotional steadiness, and sleep quality. Combines jatamansi, ashwagandha, and brahmi.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Jatamansi pacifies Vata and calms the mind. Ashwagandha strengthens resilience and reduces stress. Brahmi supports mental clarity and smooth flow of prana.

### Key Benefits
- Calms the nervous system.
- Supports healthy sleep.
- Encourages emotional balance.

## Ingredients
- Jatamansi powder or extract
- Ashwagandha extract
- Brahmi

## Usage Instructions
- Take according to label instructions. Often used in the evening or nighttime routine.

## Packaging
- Amber bottle with dosing guidance.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult practitioner if pregnant, on sedatives, or have thyroid disorders. Avoid high doses without guidance.

## Why Choose This Tonic?
A balanced formula using classical nervine herbs to support overall calmness and rest quality.
